channel.title: A Problem my Friend has... Loading Client
channel.description:
Whenever he tries to load my client, he gets " 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command."
Thing is, I'm not hosting it, but my other friend is. I can get on fine, not sure about anyone else, but he can't. Here's the client's coding (He has JDK6 update 16, and his path is set as [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] It works fine for me when I try with the uploaded client files, perfectly infact, but he just has bad luck, I guess.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2009, 02:55:03 pm[/size][hr]This also works with one of my other friends. So, any help :s?

item.title: A Problem my Friend has... Loading Client
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Whenever he tries to load my client, he gets " ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command."

Thing is, I’m not hosting it, but my other friend is. I can get on fine, not sure about anyone else, but he can’t.
Here’s the client’s coding (He has JDK6 update 16, and his path is set as CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
It works fine for me when I try with the uploaded client files, perfectly infact, but he just has bad luck, I guess.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2009, 02:55:03 pm[/size][hr]This also works with one of my other friends. So, any help :s?
